title: Tyreek Hill traded to Miami; Scariest offense in AFC; Do QB's have bad Pro Days? Steelers CB, Levi Wallace
itunes:title: Tyreek Hill traded to Miami; Scariest offense in AFC; Do QB's have bad Pro Days? Steelers CB, Levi Wallace
description:
The latest edition of The Good Morning Football Podcast dives into how the Tyreek Hill trade will affect the Miami Dolphins and impact the Kansas City Chiefs. Hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Tom Pelissero, and former Pro Bowl RB Maurice Jones-Drew debate which team now has the scariest offense in the AFC; they discuss if there’s more pressure on Tua or McDaniel in Miami; and they explore if it’s possible for a quarterback to have a bad pro day. They finish up being joined by Levi Wallace who just signed a contract with the Pittsburgh Steelers and he shares how he went from undrafted rookie to starting corner and he explains why he decided to walk on at Alabama.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
